name: mongo-fetch
description: Fetch-based Mongo Client for the Edge (Including Cloudflare Workers, Vercel Edge Functions, Deno, etc), the Browser, or Node that is API Compatible with the official `mongodb` NodeJS driver, and can hit the official Mongo Atlas Data API, or the the [Mongo Fetch Proxy](https://github.com/drivly/mongo-data-api)
author: Connor Vince <connor@driv.ly>
